title: Ticket #3711: Better upgrade documentation for new stable series
description:
This is from Stuart Anderson at LIGO:

If I haven't mentioned it previously, it might also be worth reviewing how the documentation is written for the first new Stable branch release so that it is a bit more explicit about the two different paths a user might end up there (either from the last Development or Stable release). Currently I think some of the documentation assumes you are coming from the last Development release.
remarks:
2014-Aug-15 11:26:26 by smoler:
With the recent release of 8.2.0, the new and improved section on 'Upgrading from the 8.0 to the 8.2 series of HTCondor' likely addresses this request. Therefore, abandoning the ticket. The task is completed, but without any commits that can be associated with the ticket.
